O

optimizeLocalQueries(List<LocalSelectQuery>, GlobalQuery, GlobalSchema) - Static method in class com.juraj.hdbs.querying.optimization.LocalQueryOptimizer
Entry point method for optimization; starts the optimization process
optimizeLocalQueriesByJoinColumns(GlobalQuery, List<LocalSelectQuery>) - Static method in class com.juraj.hdbs.querying.optimization.LocalQueryOptimizer
Projection is added for columns that are mentioned in global joins
optimizeLocalQueriesByLocalJoins(GlobalQuery, List<LocalSelectQuery>, GlobalSchema) - Static method in class com.juraj.hdbs.querying.optimization.LocalQueryOptimizer
Joins that reference tables of the same schema are pushed down the query tree to be executed locally
optimizeLocalQueriesBySelectColumns(List<LocalSelectQuery>, GlobalSelectQuery) - Static method in class com.juraj.hdbs.querying.optimization.LocalQueryOptimizer
Projections are added by a global select clause to minimize network traffic when receiving local results
optimizeLocalQueryByWhereColumns(GlobalQuery, List<LocalSelectQuery>) - Static method in class com.juraj.hdbs.querying.optimization.LocalQueryOptimizer
Projection is added for columns that are mentioned in the global WHERE clause
